snippet: Cost-cutting measures aided profitability, but the company warned that it faced “a cautious” environment for corporate spending on information technology.
abstract: Cisco Systems reports fiscal third-quarter profit of $2.2 billion, or 40 cents a share, up 22 percent from $1.8 billion, or 33 cents a share, in the year-ago quarter; revenue rose to $11.6 billion from $10.9 billion.
lead_paragraph: Cost-cutting measures aided profitability, but the company warned that it faced “a cautious” environment for corporate spending on information technology.

headline.seo: Cisco Cautious Despite 22% Rise in Income
headline.main: Cisco Income Rises in Line With Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Cisco Cautious Despite 22% Rise in Income
